#
# NOTE: THIS FILE HAS HAND MODIFICATIONS !!! 
#
# DO NOT EDIT THIS FILE! THIS FILE IS AUTOMATICALLY GENERATED BY xml2cmake
PROJECT(Uintah_database)

INCLUDE(${VISIT_SOURCE_DIR}/CMake/PluginMacros.cmake)
#
# NOTE: THIS FILE HAS HAND MODIFICATIONS !!! 
# Skip adding Code Gen Targets
# ADD_DATABASE_CODE_GEN_TARGETS(Uintah)
#

SET(COMMON_SOURCES
UintahPluginInfo.C
UintahCommonPluginInfo.C
)

SET(LIBI_SOURCES
UintahPluginInfo.C
)

SET(LIBM_SOURCES
UintahMDServerPluginInfo.C
${COMMON_SOURCES}
avtUintahFileFormat.C
avtUintahOptions.C
)

SET(LIBE_SOURCES
UintahEnginePluginInfo.C
${COMMON_SOURCES}
avtUintahFileFormat.C
avtUintahOptions.C
)

INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES(
${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}
${UINTAH_INCLUDE_DIR}
${VISIT_COMMON_INCLUDES}
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/DBAtts/MetaData
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/DBAtts/SIL
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Database/Database
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Database/Formats
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Database/Ghost
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/FileWriter
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Filters
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/MIR/Base
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/MIR/Tet
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/MIR/Zoo
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Math
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Pipeline/AbstractFilters
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Pipeline/Data
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Pipeline/Pipeline
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Pipeline/Sinks
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Pipeline/Sources
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/VisWindow/VisWindow
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/visit_vtk/full
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/visit_vtk/lightweight
${VTK_INCLUDE_DIRS}
)

# NOTE: Quotes are needed around UINTAH_LIBRARY_DIR and
# UINTAH_INTERFACES_LIB because they are used as strings in
# avtUintahFileFormat.cc

ADD_DEFINITIONS(-DUINTAH_LIBRARY_DIR="${UINTAH_LIBRARY_DIR}")
ADD_DEFINITIONS(-DUINTAH_INTERFACES_LIB="${UINTAH_INTERFACES_LIB}")
ADD_DEFINITIONS(-DUINTAH_VERSION_HEX=${UINTAH_VERSION_HEX})

LINK_DIRECTORIES(${VISIT_LIBRARY_DIR} ${UINTAH_LIBRARY_DIR} )

ADD_LIBRARY(IUintahDatabase ${LIBI_SOURCES})
TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(IUintahDatabase visitcommon)
SET(INSTALLTARGETS IUintahDatabase)

IF(NOT VISIT_ENGINE_ONLY AND NOT VISIT_DBIO_ONLY)
    ADD_LIBRARY(MUintahDatabase ${LIBM_SOURCES})
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(MUintahDatabase visitcommon avtdbatts avtdatabase_ser ${UINTAH_LIB} )
    ADD_TARGET_DEFINITIONS(MUintahDatabase MDSERVER)
    SET(INSTALLTARGETS ${INSTALLTARGETS} MUintahDatabase)
ENDIF(NOT VISIT_ENGINE_ONLY AND NOT VISIT_DBIO_ONLY)

ADD_LIBRARY(EUintahDatabase_ser ${LIBE_SOURCES})
TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(EUintahDatabase_ser visitcommon avtdatabase_ser avtpipeline_ser ${UINTAH_LIB} )
ADD_TARGET_DEFINITIONS(EUintahDatabase_ser ENGINE)
SET(INSTALLTARGETS ${INSTALLTARGETS} EUintahDatabase_ser)

IF(VISIT_PARALLEL)
    ADD_PARALLEL_LIBRARY(EUintahDatabase_par ${LIBE_SOURCES})
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(EUintahDatabase_par visitcommon avtdatabase_par avtpipeline_par ${UINTAH_LIB} )
    ADD_TARGET_DEFINITIONS(EUintahDatabase_par ENGINE)
    SET(INSTALLTARGETS ${INSTALLTARGETS} EUintahDatabase_par)
ENDIF(VISIT_PARALLEL)

VISIT_INSTALL_DATABASE_PLUGINS(${INSTALLTARGETS})
VISIT_PLUGIN_TARGET_RTOD(databases ${INSTALLTARGETS})
VISIT_PLUGIN_TARGET_FOLDER(databases Uintah ${INSTALLTARGETS})
